availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Roberts (Simpson Co. KY, shoe maker)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, boot and shoe maker. Tennessee native. Married to Sarah A. Roberts. Father of William D. Roberts. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Boot and shoe maker in Simpson County in 1860. Employed James H. Claiborne as a merchant in Simpson County in 1860. Employed Phoeba A. Williams in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 5A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 139.
